shell.geometry

Class GooMetry

  • java.lang.Object
    • shell.geometry.GooMetry

  • public class GooMetry
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculates latitude, longitude and elevation values by a given address or location point. dlat=1°=111 km dl=1°=60 min
    Author:
    Nguyen Viet Tan
